section.title: Building
section.para: You can build a package by clicking on the button Build package. Any building errors (such as compilation errors) are shown, failing the build. You can chose to build the whole package or a subset of it (see next sections).

warning.para: In cases of a large number of rules, all these operations can take some time.

section.para: If the build was successful, you can download the binary package as a pkg file. Also you will have the option to create a snapshot for deployment. You can also view the DRL that this package results in by clicking on the package source link.

note.para: If you wish to rebuild all packages in bulk, you can do that faster with the left menu Knowledge Bases, menu Create New, menu item Rebuild all packages binaries.
